title: Software Developer
description: Developed PHP software to streamline administrative tasks for the Territorial Army.
Collaborated with military personnel to gather requirements and ensure the software met their needs.
Implemented user authentication and role-based access control to secure sensitive information.
Provided training and support to end-users, enhancing their ability to effectively utilize the new software.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Developed advanced web applications using the MERN stack, Next.js, and TypeScript, integrating third-party APIs to enhance functionality.
Developed and maintained server-side applications using Node.js, and designed and implemented RESTful APIs to enhance backend services.
Improved application performance by resolving bugs, maintaining documentation, and utilizing Strapi CMS and Git for efficient development and project management.

title: Devops Intern
description: Managed cloud infrastructure on AWS, GCP, and Azure, focusing on security, billing, and architecture data.
Developed automation scripts using Boto3 for efficient handling of infrastructure tasks.
Utilized Docker for containerization, ensuring scalable and reliable application deployments.

title: ML Developer
description: Developed advanced AI systems, improving forecasting capabilities and streamlining automated content creation.
Crafted intuitive and interactive user interfaces, streamlining the deployment and utilization of AI models for diverse user groups.

title: MERN Stack Developer Intern
description: Directed the development of dynamic websites using the MERN stack, improving overall application efficiency significantly.
Led development of key features using React and Node.js/Express.js, boosting user interaction. Optimized MongoDB databases to improve app speed and usability.
